## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                      | Type                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------- |

| `temas`  | --        | Define quais os temas            | `MedTema[] \| undefined` | `undefined` |

| ----------- | -------------------------- | --------------------- |
